  • Method Details

    • setAvailableGames

      public void setAvailableGames()
      Updates the list of available games in the UI. Synchronizes access to the game list and updates the ListView.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the main menu view controller, called automatically by JavaFX. Sets up combo boxes and list view cell factories.

    • handleChooseGameForm

      public void handleChooseGameForm()
      Handles the UI event when user wants to join an existing game. Shows the choose game form.

    • handleChooseGame

      public void handleChooseGame()
      Handles the selection of a game from the available games list. Validates the selection and proceeds to color selection.

    • handleSubmitJoinGame

      public void handleSubmitJoinGame()
      Handles the UI event when user submits their game join request. Validates color selection and sends join request to server.

    • getControllerType

      public String getControllerType()
      Returns the type identifier for this controller.
      Specified by:
      getControllerType in class GuiController
      Returns:
      String identifier "MainMenuViewController"

      Shows a disconnect message to the user and exits the application.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

    • showMessage

      public void showMessage(String errorMessage, boolean isPermanent)
      Shows a message to the user in the main menu view.
      Specified by:
      showMessage in class GuiController
      Parameters:
      errorMessage - the message to display
      isPermanent - whether the message should persist or fade out

    • refreshGameInfos

      public void refreshGameInfos(List<GameInfo> gameInfos)
      Refreshes the list of available games with new data from the server.
